quotes.quote: History never repeats itself. Man always does.
A meaningless phrase repeated again and again begins to resemble truth.
History must repeat itself because we pay such little attention to it the first time.
Only fools repeat the same things over and over, expecting to obtain different results.
We are what we repeatedly do but we can be perceived by what we repeatedly say.
He who repeats what he does not understand is no better than an ass that is loaded with books.
If something is repeated over and over as obvious, the chances are that it is obviously false.
Nature never repeats herself, and the possibilities of one human soul will never be found in another.
There is no reason to repeat bad history.
If they can't repeat it, they didn't get it.
If you repeat a lie often enough it becomes accepted as truth.
You repeat things because they're like your personal obsessions.
Why repeat the old errors, if there are so many new errors to commit?
History doesn't repeat itself; it rhymes.
Nature repeats itself, but it never starts from the beginning.
When you repeat a mistake, it is not a mistake anymore: it is a decision.
We shouldn't repeat the same for ages on end, but look into the new as well.
History repeats itself over and over again, but most of us have short memories.
History that repeats itself turns to farce. Farce that repeats itself turns to history.
The repeated lies become history, but they don't necessarily become the truth.
Never affirm or repeat about your health what you do not wish to be true.
That is never too often repeated which is never sufficiently learned.
Those who would repeat the past must control the teaching of history.
It is the repeated performance of just and temperate actions that produces virtue.
When you talk, you repeat what you already know; when you listen, you often learn something.
Either you repeat the same conventional doctrines everybody is saying, or else you say something true, and it will sound like it's from Neptune.
Repeat anything often enough and it will start to become you.
Repeating, trying to repeat success - it never gets easier.
We all want to not repeat ourselves constantly, and explore the limits of our capabilities.
If you repeat something, it can become pointless. Some things can repeat and be endlessly fascinating.
